pages.title: Boomerang Cache
pages.text: BoomerangCache is a client side caching library based on localStorage and sessionStorage

pages.title: Getting Started
pages.text: BoomerangCache is a client side caching library based on localStorage API Reference create check set get getAll length remove clear

pages.title: create
pages.text: BoomerangCache.create Creates a new bucket. Arguments bucket (String) options (Object) type: (local | session) var boomerang = BoomerangCache.create('bucket_1');

pages.title: set
pages.text: BoomerangCache.set Set a key to a particular value or a hash object (Object or Array) under a hash key. Arguments key (String) value (String, Number, Object, Array) seconds (Number) - optional These values will never expire and will only be removed when you (or the browser) removes them. boomerang.set('stringData', 'Hello World'); boomerang.set('numberData', 12345); boomerang.set('objectData', {value: 'Hello World'}); boomerang.set('arrayData', [{value: 'Hello World'}, {value: 'Hello Boomerang'}]); Set values with expire After 3 seconds this will return null. var seconds = 3; boomerang.set('key', 'Hello World', seconds);

pages.title: get
pages.text: BoomerangCache.get Returns the saved value for given key. If value is null or undefined it returns a default value. Arguments key (String) defaultValue (String, Number, Object, Array) boomerang.get('key', 'Hello World'); // If value is null returns Hello World. boomerang.set('key'); // returns value

pages.title: getAll
pages.text: BoomerangCache.getAll Returns all saved values. boomerang.getAll(); // {key1: 'value1'}, {key2: 'value2'}

pages.title: length
pages.text: BoomerangCache.length Returns all values count. boomerang.length(); // returns 2

pages.title: remove
pages.text: BoomerangCache.remove Remove a key from storage Arguments key (String) boomerang.remove('key');
